parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the infotainment system can cause unintended inputs, leading to distractions while driving, potentially causing accidents. It can also disable safety features, such as brake assist and rain-sensing wipers, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The infotainment screen registers inputs when not touched
and beeps. The screen may also go dark or light mode
and Bluetooth connections may be disrupted.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rodent Damage to Main Wiring Harness
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Rodent damage to the main wiring harness can cause electrical shorts, leading to fires or other safety hazards.
symptoms: potentially causing electrical shorts or fires.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The "ghost touch" issue can cause the infotainment system to malfunction, leading to distractions while driving, and potentially causing accidents.
The infotainment system rebooting can cause the backup camera to turn off, creating a safety issue, especially when reversing.
symptoms: The main screen reboots every 2-3 minutes
sometimes preventing access to the menu
and causing the navigation system to malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The door latch failure can cause the door to not close properly, potentially leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The passenger door does not close completely
and the latch does not lock into place.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sunroof explosion can cause injuries or damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: The sunroof explodes without any apparent reason or warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The Smart City Brake Support malfunction can cause sudden and violent stops, potentially leading to injuries or accidents.
symptoms: causing the vehicle to come to a sudden stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The backup camera failure can cause accidents or injuries, especially when reversing.
symptoms: providing a false picture on the cabin screen

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking of the infotainment display screen can impair the driver's ability to clearly view important information, such as navigation, safety alerts, and vehicle settings, which can lead to distraction and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The display screen develops a "spider web cracking" pattern
making it difficult to read or view information on the screen.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning of the heated seat can cause burns or discomfort to the driver, and potentially lead to accidents or near-miss incidents due to distraction or discomfort.
symptoms: specifically in the lower back area
causing the leather material to melt or deform; the heating element does not heat the entire seat
but only the lower back part; the seat becomes excessively hot
and can cause burns or discomfort when touched.
